event.title: Lang-8 presents an International exchange party
event.description:
Lang-8 is a Language Exchange web service used by more than 170,000 people.

Lang-8 will hold a real international exchange party – not just something online.

We think you’ll be able to find foreign friends and language exchange partners there.

We will have events that will make it easy to get to know new people.

There will also be soft drinks, alcohol, and some snacks.
event.address: 東京都中央区銀座5-5-14 GINZA GATES 11F
